title: Narippanashi no Ai no Kane
original_name: なりっぱなしの愛の鐘
sinopse:
In the past, Ryotatsu had always gotten himself into fights. After working hard to acquire a cooking license, he helped out his grandfather maintaining a Chinese eatery. However, his grandfather was conned to debt by a yakuza, whose group would then harass them. One day, when Ryotatsu went to the yakuza’s office to deliver takeaways, Ryotatsu met his high school kouhai. Reunion with Hidemaru …? The second siege of the overheated love attack!

(Source: MU)
